# <a name="fix-outlook-on-the-web-sync-issues"></a><span data-ttu-id="ea938-102">Popravite Outlook na Webu problemi pri sinhronizaciji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ea938-102">Fix Outlook on the web sync issues</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ea938-103">Outlook na Webu prikazuje mobilne uređaje koje koristite za povezivanje sa poštanskim sandučetom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ea938-103">Outlook on the web shows the mobile devices you use to connect to your mailbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ea938-104">Ako više ne koristite uređaj ili uređaj nije ispravno sinhronizaciju, možete da je izbrišete sa ove liste.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ea938-104">If you're no longer using a device or a device isn't syncing properly, you can delete it from this list.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="ea938-105">Odaberite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ea938-105">Choose</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="ea938-106">**Postavke** > **sve Outlook postavke prikaza** > **General** > **mobilnim uređajima**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ea938-106">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **General** > **Mobile devices**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="ea938-107">Premestite kursor preko uređaj na listi, a zatim izaberite ikonu za smeće</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ea938-107">Move the cursor over your device in the list, and then select the trash icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="ea938-108">da biste izbrisali uređaj partnerstvo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ea938-108">to delete the device partnership.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="ea938-109">Na vrhu prozora, izaberite **Sačuvaj**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ea938-109">At the top of the window, select **Save**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="ea938-110">Idi na svoj mobilni uređaj i potpuno ga napaja se.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ea938-110">Go to your mobile device and power it off completely.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="ea938-111">Ponovo pokrenite Vaš mobilni uređaj nakon nekoliko sekundi, a onda ponovnu sinhronizaciju poštansko sanduče.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ea938-111">Restart your mobile device after a few seconds, and then sync your mailbox again.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ea938-112">Da biste saznali više, vidim [ispravka e-mail sinhronizaciju pitanja ili uklonite uređaj iz tvoj pogled na poštansko sanduče na web](https://support.office.com/article/775ed31c-05bd-4ee4-b1b3-33fad7b5b992)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ea938-112">To learn more, see [Fix email sync issues or remove a device from your Outlook on the web mailbox](https://support.office.com/article/775ed31c-05bd-4ee4-b1b3-33fad7b5b992)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ea938-113">*Napomena:* Povezani nalozi više nisu podržane u programu Outlook na Webu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ea938-113">*Note:* Connected accounts are no longer supported in Outlook on the web.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ea938-114">Da biste saznali više, pogledajte [povezani nalozi više nisu podržane u programu Outlook na Webu](https://support.office.com/article/5cc526bf-e928-4a99-8b9f-5e089df7d887)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ea938-114">To learn more, see [Connected accounts are no longer supported in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/5cc526bf-e928-4a99-8b9f-5e089df7d887)</span></span>
